Name: Zoning, Brooklyn Yards, Brooklyn (C 230182 ZMK).
Title: Application number C 230182 ZMK (Brooklyn Yards) submitted by Brooklyn Yards Development, LLC, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section Nos. 22c and 22d, changing from an R5 District to an R6 District, changing from an M1-1 District to an R6 District, changing from an M1-1 District to a C4-5 District, and  establishing within the proposed R6 District a C2-4 District, Borough of Brooklyn, Community Districts 11 and 12, Council Districts 43 and 44.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
